name: Blades with blades
description:
My school mate Konniedraws made #Konnietober2020 as an alternative to Inktober. I decided to take the "all media are allowed" rule very liberally.

Day 5's theme was Blades, and for some reason my first thought was blades of grass, and soon this idea was born. Have fun!

Credits:
Programming, design, lack of art: Mana Kouwenberg

Music: 
Motherlode by Kevin MacLeod
Link | License

Special thanks: Konniedraws
